column2: Qulsary) is a town  and the center of the Zhylyoi District in the Atyrau Region of western Kazakhstan. Population: {{Kz-census2020]60
column4: 518 (1999 Census results).The city is located 11 kilometers from the Emba River
column5: and 230 kilometers from the city of Atyrau
column6: the center of the Atyrau Region.  The railroad station is on the Makat-Beyneu line.

column1: The city is home to the mining of petroleum and a scrap metal processing plant. It also has a most remarkable cemetery made up of domed chambers large enough to be houses.
Kulsary has a cold desert climate (Köppen climate classification: BWk).
